body_html:
@elgehelge I totally agree with you and share the same pain.

I would like to share few things here

  1. We are improving the behavior for non-distributed case to avoid such confusion. It is not easy due to some special environments. But we are working on that. You should see some change soon in the master head (should be one or two weeks). With that, we hope this issue can be resolved.

  2. I have opened a team discussion to see whether we could detect the early stopping triggered by the input pipeline, i.e, dataset in your case. At least, a warning in the log should help user. We should give actionable, debuggable instructions. Hope you agree with this.

I will close this issue once one of both is arrived. Hopefully both.
